item.title: Darcy add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "I'm sorry if this all seems a little rushed and desperate. It is." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Darcy add a quote by William G.T. Shedd
item.description: "A ship is safe in harbor, but that's not what ships are for." -- William G.T. Shedd

item.title: Darcy add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "And the day came when the risk to remain tight in a bud was more painful than the risk it took to blossom." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Darcy add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Folks are usually about as happy as they make their minds up to be." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Darcy add a quote by Pema Chodron
item.description: "People get into a heavy-duty sin and guilt trip, feeling that if things are going wrong, that means that they did something bad and they are being punished. That's not the idea at all. The idea of karma is that you continually get the teachings that you need to open your heart. To the degree that you didn't understand in the past how to stop protecting your soft spot, how to stop armoring your heart, you're given this gift of teachings in the form of your life, to give you everything you need to open further." -- Pema Chodron

item.title: Darcy add a quote by Pema Chodron
item.description: "We don't set out to save the world; we set out to wonder how other people are doing and to reflect on how our actions affect other people's hearts." -- Pema Chodron

item.title: Darcy add a quote by Neil deGrasse Tyson
Darcy add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "Curiosity, especially intellectual inquisitiveness, is what separates the truly alive from those who are merely going through the motions." -- Tom Robbins
